description:
Gao’s finding it hard to juggle his duties as a Buddy Police Trainee and a full time student, especially when he has to leave in the middle of class to chase down an illegal monster who’s stolen his friends’ Buddyfight card decks. And who is Death Shido?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hyaku Oni Shuurai! Tenbu o Mamore!
The Hundred Demons Attack! Protect Tenbu!
百鬼襲来! 天武を守れ!!
